content: * Says terminates plan to bid for German waste management company Energy from Waste (EEW)
name: Waste Management Inc
title: BRIEF-China Tianying terminates plan to bid for German waste management company

content: FRANKFURT  Feb 4 Beijing Enterprise  has struck a deal to buy German waste management company Energy from Waste (EEW) as China sets about tackling an acute problem with the environment and waste recycling.
name: Waste Management Inc
title: Beijing Enterprises buys Germany's Energy from Waste

content: FRANKFURT Beijing Enterprise  is buying German waste management company Energy from Waste (EEW) for 1.4 billion euros ($1.6 billion) as China sets about tackling its pollution and waste recycling problems.
name: Waste Management Inc
title: Beijing Enterprise buys Germany's Energy from Waste

content: * China needs top notch waste management technology   (Adds details on valuation  deal advisers)
name: Waste Management Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Beijing Enterprise buys Germany's Energy from Waste

content: FRANKFURT  Feb 4 Beijing Enterprise  has entered advanced talks to buy German waste management company Energy from Waste for 1.8 billion euros ($2 billion)  two people familiar with the deal said.
name: Waste Management Inc
title: Beijing Enterprise in advanced talks to buy Germany's Energy from Waste - sources

content: FRANKFURT  Jan 28 Several Chinese companies are fighting over German waste management company Energy from Waste (EEW) in a deal potentially worth about 1.8 billion euros ($1.96 billion)  several people familiar with the matter said.
name: Waste Management Inc
title: German waste manager attracts new Chinese bidders - sources

content: WASHINGTON  March 13 The Justice Department said on Friday it granted antitrust approval for Waste Management Inc's purchase of Deffenbaugh Disposal  Inc.
name: Waste Management Inc
title: Waste Management wins antitrust approval for Deffenbaugh deal
